Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Introductie

Stap in een boeiende en innovatieve rol als Data Scientist met Business Inzicht binnen een dynamische, datagedreven omgeving! Hier krijg je de unieke kans om jouw passie voor data te combineren met je scherp inzicht in bedrijfsprocessen en een directe impact te maken. Bij Van de Velde brengen we alle schakels van de keten samen: van productie en distributie tot retail en digital, zowel voor B2B als B2C. Deze veelzijdigheid biedt jou uitdagende projecten en afwisseling. Je kunt je onder andere richten op het optimaliseren van geavanceerde forecastingmodellen voor productieplanning en het ontwikkelen van slimme maatadvies-tools die onze klanten helpen de perfecte pasvorm te vinden. Je komt terecht in een geavanceerde DATA & IT omgeving voornamelijk opgebouwd in Azure cloudomgeving met een uitgewerkte data lakehouse. Het bestaande Data team heeft al een solide basis uitgewerkt, waar samen verder kan op gebouwd worden.




Over ons




Van de Velde is een ambitieus & internationaal bedrijf dat met meer dan 100 jaar ervaring de bekende premium lingeriemerken Marie Jo, PrimaDonna en Sarda creëert en produceert. Wil je deel uitmaken van een zeer toegewijd en uiterst professioneel team, +1500 medewerkers wereldwijd? Van de Velde lingerie, reeds 25 jaar beursgenoteerd, blijft groeien.

Onze missie: ‘we ignite the power in women’

Van de Velde is een bedrijf waar medewerkers altijd centraal hebben gestaan. Wij geloven sterk in de kracht en het potentieel van mensen, en in de kracht in vrouwen in het bijzonder. Dat uit zich in onze relatie met medewerkers, consumenten en vrouwen in de samenleving.

We zijn gedreven door Passie | We ademen Kwaliteit | We zijn authentiek | We richten ons op Consumenten en Klanten | We zijn Ondernemend | Samen zijn we Sterk.

Wij zijn op zoek naar een collega die ons kan helpen groeien, dezelfde waarden deelt en ernaar uitkijkt om samen met een goed contact met onze klanten te onderhouden. Ben je bereid om een positief verschil te maken? Zet je carrière verder en kom werken bij Van de Velde lingerie!




Je functie

Als Data Scientist met Business Inzicht maak je deel uit van een dynamisch team. Je werkt in een geavanceerde Data & IT-omgeving, voornamelijk opgebouwd in de Azure cloud met een uitgewerkte data lakehouse. Jij speelt een cruciale rol in het identificeren van business vraagstukken en vertaalt deze naar datagedreven oplossingen die impact hebben op de bedrijfsresultaten. Je werkt nauw samen met verschillende interne teams, zoals Sales, Demand, Marketing en Data, om de juiste data-oplossingen te ontwikkelen en implementeren.

Identificeren business vraagstukken: Je identificeert business vraagstukken en gaat op zoek naar oplossingen via data-analyse. Je doet aanbevelingen voor mogelijke verbetertoepassingen.
Data analyse: Je analyseert complexe datasets om trends en kansen te identificeren, onderzoekt data-gaten en adviseert over aanvullende gegevensverzameling. Je vertaalt ruwe data naar toepasbare inzichten die de strategische bedrijfsdoelen ondersteunen. Daarnaast ontwikkel en experimenteer je met voorspellende modellen en machine learning om besluitvorming en bedrijfsresultaten te optimaliseren.
Ontwikkelen en implementeren van datagedreven oplossingen: Je ontwikkelt en implementeert POCs en je zet deze om naar oplossing in productie binnen de bestaande dataomgeving. Je volgt mee de geïmplementeerde oplossing op en meet de effectiviteit.
Stakeholder Management: Je bouwt sterke relaties op met interne stakeholders zoals Sales, Demand, Marketing en Data om datagedreven oplossingen te implementeren. Je kan je oplossing helder en begrijpelijk overbrengen naar niet-technische en technische teams.




Je profiel

Je hebt een masterdiploma en meer dan 5 jaar ervaring in de bedrijfswereld, bij voorkeur met een achtergrond als handelsingenieur of een businessgerichte opleiding met sterke affiniteit voor data.
Je hebt uitstekende analytische vaardigheden en kunt data effectief analyseren en interpreteren om waardevolle inzichten te genereren.
Je hebt kennis van bedrijfsprocessen binnen operations, sales of marketing en kunt deze vertalen naar datagedreven oplossingen.
Je denkt creatief en innovatief en draagt zo bij aan de (toekomstige) bedrijfsdoelstellingen.
Je hebt ervaring met verschillende databronnen, zoals bijvoorbeeld forecast/sales/productie data.
Je hebt kennis van bestaande algoritmes, forecastmodellen en de bijbehorende problematieken.
Je hebt probleemoplossend vermogen en kunt complexe bedrijfsproblemen oplossen door datagestuurde benaderingen.
Je hebt ervaring met Python (must-have) en kennis van machine learning frameworks zoals PyTorch, NumPy, SciPy en MLFlow is een plus.
Je hebt een goede kennis van Nederlands en Engels.




Ons aanbod

Een contract van onbepaalde duur in een voltijdse tewerkstelling.
Een competitief loon met bedrijfswagen en extralegale voordelen in functie van de job.
Aandacht voor work-life balance.
9 ADV-dagen bovenop het wettelijke verlof.
Bij opstart een grondig opleidingstraject on the job, zodat elke werknemer zich optimaal kan ontplooien.
Een uitdagende en autonome job in een stabiel, internationaal en beursgenoteerd modebedrijf met een aangename bedrijfscultuur waar ruimte is voor eigen initiatief en ideeën.
Maandelijkse organiseren wij een VdV-café waar je jouw collega’s ook eens op een andere manier kan leren kennen.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Мы делаем фандрайзинговую платформу Fundraise Up. Это самый удобный и быстрый способ пожертвовать деньги в пользу некоммерческого фонда. Мы изобретаем способы ускорить загрузку, увеличить конверсию, принять оплату разными способами и т.д. Каждый месяц люди со всего мира донатят десятки миллионов долларов через нашу платформу.

Крупнейшие некоммерческие организации мира используют наше решение чтобы собирать деньги. Например, UNICEF, самый известный международный фонд ООН, делает весь онлайн-фандрайзинг на нашей платформе. Аналогично поступают Барак Обама, Ассоциация изучения Альцгеймера и многие другие. Наш рейтинг на самой популярной платформе для отзывов — 4.9 из 5.

Мы работаем в энтерпрайз-сегменте. Наши клиенты находятся по всему миру, но основная концентрация приходится на США, Канаду, Великобританию и Австралию.




Продукт

Продукт, который мы делаем — большой и сложный. Он состоит из нескольких частей: чекаут и виджеты (каждый из них, это небольшое SPA), порталы для донора, организации и партнеров, админка и еще несколько приложений.




Команда

В компании работает 180 человек. В офисе в Нью-Йорке маркетинг, продажи, онбординг и саппорт. Удаленно мы принимаем продуктовые решения, делаем дизайн и разработку.

Продуктовая команда маленькая и в этом кайф — у нас нет «незначительных» задач. Все что мы делаем — важно. Команда сильная и в этом отдельный кайф — всегда интересно быть в окружении крутых людей, которые делятся опытом.




Кого ищем




Есть опыт решения задач в одной и более областей из:

RecSys;
Ulift modeling;
Churn prediction;
LTV prediction;
Forecasting.




Умение проводить A/B тестирование моделей в production;

Владение MLOps инструментами для сервинга и мониторинга моделей;

Хорошее знание SQL;

Уровень английского языка не ниже Intermediate.

Супер-важно уметь соблюдать все виды договоренностей.




Пара важных вещей

Позиция предполагает релокацию из РФ и РБ. При желании вы можете воспользоваться нашей программой релокации, которая распространяется на Европу, Сербию и Грузию.
Мы работаем удаленно, но с 9 до 18 часов по CET. В это время мы интенсивно созваниваемся и много обсуждаем.




Формальный список того, что нужно делать

Полный цикл обработки данных (EDA, сбор и очистка данных, feature engineering и т.д.),
Решение задач регрессии, кластеризации, классификации,
Разработка и реализация моделей машинного обучения,
Доведение моделей до Production.




Зачем мы вам

Мы строим сильную команду людей с горящими глазами. У каждого свой опыт, которым он охотно делится.
У нас нет ветвистой иерархии, все люди доступны на расстоянии zoom-звонка. В компании открыта почти вся финансовая статистика, мы регулярно рассказываем как устроен продукт, продажи, саппорт, откуда появляются клиенты и деньги, что интересного случилось и т.д.
Мы верим в долгие отношения и выдаем разработчикам сток-опции. Компания хорошо растет — только за прошлый год мы вырастили метрики в два раза.




Бонусы

Нам важно чтобы работая удаленно, вы чувствовали себя комфортно. Обычно мы отправляем сотрудникам Macbook и нужное число мониторов. Если ваше рабочее место не обустроено, то пришлем стол, удобное кресло и все что нужно для продуктивной работы.

Полностью оплачиваем необходимое ПО, книги и коворкинг, если не хотите работать из дома. Помогаем с оплатой спортзала и бассейна, курсов английского и любого профильного образования.




Раз в год собираемся всей командой в оффлайне. В 2021 мы арендовали огромную виллу на Кипре, в 2022 встречались в отеле под Тбилиси, а в 2023 устроили недельный выезд на 60 человек на курорт в Турции. В следующем году будет что-то новое :-)

Title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test I, AI governance
Description:
Joining Collibra’s Test Engineering team


You will take part in testing activities in the Scrum Team and assist in the successful execution of testing strategies.
You will develop and promote the testing knowledge within an Agile team and provide the needed help and assistance in enabling developers to test.
You will share your experience on a variety of testing tools relevant to our business environment and drive experimentation towards further improvements.
You will define and maintain metrics and promote testing awareness within Engineering.
You will promote a shift-left approach in testing across Engineering.
You will drive Test Data definition and develop scalable frameworks and tools to solve problems.


This is a hybrid position based in Brussels, Belgium.

SDET, Test Engineering at Collibra are responsible for


Reviewing requirement specifications and user stories to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
Designing, development and execution of automation scripts and Test Automation frameworks (Cypress, Playwright, Rest Assured, etc).
Working on the continuous integration of your scripts (Jenkins) and driving the team on the way towards continuous testing.
Identifying, documenting and tracking issues.
Working closely with Software/Test Engineers and Product Managers across the organization to understand the context and drive automation and testing to meet objectives.
Taking part in exploratory testing and test design sessions - to help in improving the overall product quality.
Acquiring a deep understanding of the domain and approach testing holistically, ensuring comprehensive coverage.
Have a critical mindset to discern what to automate and what not to, strategically sampling critical tests with a focus on balancing risk, cost, and value.
Coach developers and other SDETs.
K8s and Helm chart.


You Have


Minimum 8 years of experience in Test Automation.
Knowledge of software QA methodologies and tools (JIRA or similar) and processes.
Experience in Java and/or TypeScript and hands-on experience with automated testing tools (Cypress, Playwright, Rest Assured, etc.).
Experience with DevOps, Gradle, Jenkins and Docker.
Good communication skills and enjoy collaborating with fellow co-workers.
Ability to identify flaws in the testing process, toolset, infrastructure and to propose and drive necessary improvements.
A bachelor’s degree or equivalent related working experience is required.
You must have work authorization to work in Brussels, Belgium.


You Are


Experienced in building Test Automation Frameworks and in continuous delivery/continuous testing environment.
Experienced in building/maintaining CICD pipelines.
Experienced in working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
Able to identify testing and quality challenges.
Able to create innovative solutions to solve complex problems.
A person with great communication skills and who enjoys collaborating with fellow co-worker.
Able to combine automation skills with manual part of testing (Exploratory).
Able to think independently with curiosity, criticism and keen attention to details.
Well organized and accustomed to an innovative environment.


Measures of success are


Within your first month, you will complete your onboarding and all the mandatory learnings, whilst becoming familiar with the product, tech stack and test frameworks.
Within your third month, you will be actively contributing to the test processes and improvements to test coverage.
Within your sixth month, you will own test projects and be driving the team on quality improvements.

Collibra recognizes and values that everyone has different needs, interests, and life goals. We built our {Be}well benefits program with flexibility in mind to support you and your loved ones through a diverse range of circumstances and life events. These flexible offerings sit on a foundation of competitive compensation, health coverage, and time off.

Collibrians are ambitious and inventive, and we want to develop our skills individually and as a team. You’ll have access to development opportunities, as well as other rewards and recognition programs to help grow your career.

Title: Python and Kubernetes Software Engineer - Data, AI/ML & Analytics
Description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1000+ colleagues in 70+ countries and very few roles based in offices. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

Title: AI Engineer-Public sector
Description:
Position Description

At CGI, we’re looking for AI experts who want to make a tangible impact. You’ll lead AI innovation, helping our clients unlock the true value of their data, while working with cutting-edge technologies in a team that values diversity and continuous learning.

Your role in our team


Lead AI Awareness: Conduct workshops to increase awareness of AI and demonstrate its value for our clients’ businesses.
Deliver AI Solutions: Use industry-specific methods to solve client challenges, create trusted data sets, and develop data pipelines for AI model training.
Accelerate Decision-Making: Guide clients toward “speed to trusted action” through AI solutions, discovering AI opportunities via AI Design Sprint workshops, and building AI centers of excellence with a focus on governance and ethical AI.
Develop & Optimize: Implement AI models and solutions, ensuring ethical and responsible practices, and optimize existing AI systems for better performance.
Full AI Lifecycle: Be involved in the full AI lifecycle, including data preparation, design, coding, testing, deployment, and support.
Best Practices & Knowledge Transfer: Create internal guidelines for AI, train internal teams, and contribute to best practices for ethical AI.
Stay Current: Keep up with the latest AI trends, technologies, and ethical standards, and address biases in AI datasets and models.
Document & Share: Maintain clear documentation of AI development processes and decisions, ensuring transparency


How You Strengthen Our Team

We need someone who can bring both expertise and a passion for AI:


Proven experience in developing and deploying machine learning models and AI solutions.
Expertise in at least 2 areas: Statistics, Regression, Clustering, Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, Machine Learning Visualization, or Tree Ensembles.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python, R, or Java, and familiarity with frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark) and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Strong data management skills, including data preprocessing and analysis.
Excellent problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset.
Commitment to ethical AI practices and staying up-to-date with the field’s advancements.
Ability to handle multiple projects in a dynamic environment.
Clear communication and documentation skills for both technical and non-technical audiences.
Fluency in French or Dutch, with strong English skills.
A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.
Medior Profile: 3 to 5 years of experience.
Senior Profile: More than 5 years of experience, preferably with a public sector background.


A pre-employment screening is part of the application process

Why join CGI?

At CGI, we believe in responsible and human-centric AI. For over 30 years, we’ve helped organizations realize lasting value from their AI investments. We prioritize outcomes that benefit stakeholders and align with societal values. Here’s what we offer:


A collaborative environment in small, self-managing expert teams.
The opportunity to drive your career with space for continuous development.
Work with the latest AI technologies.
An attractive salary with excellent benefits.
A permanent contract from the start.
The opportunity to become a CGI shareholder.


What's in it for you ?


Direct impact on the future of AI within a leading IT & Business consultancy.
Work with the latest technologies in a supportive and dynamic environment.
Opportunities for career growth and continuous learning.
A focus on ethical AI and best practices in the field.
A diverse and inclusive workplace where your ideas are valued.


Join our team of experts and apply now!

Questions about the position? Ask them to Gregory Depasse, Director Consulting Services, Public sector, via gregory.depasse@cgi.com.

For more information about the application procedure, please contact recruiter Fabienne Philips fabienne.philips@cgi.com

We do not collaborate with external recruitment agencies. Therefore, unsolicited acquisition is not appreciated.

Your future duties and responsibilities

Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role

Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.

Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…

You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.

Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.

You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.

Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
About Us:

Duferco is a global company with diverse interests spanning energy retail and trading, steel manufacturing, insurance, and logistics. Innovation has always driven our success and continues to shape our future. Our Corporate Innovation Team operates in a start-up-like, corporate-backed environment, focused on exploring, nurturing, and implementing cutting-edge ideas, technologies, and strategies to propel our organization to new heights.

At Duferco, we value talent, proactivity, and passion. We foster a culture where every team member is empowered to take ownership of their work, actively contribute to the team’s success, and grow professionally by taking on increasing responsibility. Collaboration, continuous learning, and a shared drive for innovation are central to our ethos. If you are self-motivated, eager to make an impact, and passionate about tackling challenges head-on, you’ll thrive here.

As we continue to expand and diversify our operations, we are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in advancing our mission to use advanced analytics and machine learning to drive innovation and excellence across our diverse portfolio of businesses. If you are passionate about pushing the boundaries of applied data science, acting swiftly, and exploring new technologies that can make a significant impact on our business, we would love to hear from you.




Responsibilities:

Develop, implement, and optimize data science solutions for various applications, including industrial manufacturing, energy retail, insurance, and trading.
Collaborate closely with business units to understand needs and gather feedback to inform and enhance data science solutions.
Collect, preprocess, and analyze large datasets to train, validate, and deploy machine learning and AI models.
Ensure the robustness, scalability, and efficiency of models deployed in production environments.
Work with cross-functional teams to integrate data-driven solutions into existing systems and processes, or help define new ones.
Proactively research and evaluate emerging technologies to drive operational improvements.




Qualifications:

A Master's degree with 2-3 years of relevant experience, or a Ph.D., in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
Hands-on experience with Python and commonly used data science and machine learning frameworks.
Experience working with both structured and unstructured data, including data pipelines, ETL processes, and organizing data in databases, data warehouses, and data lakes.
Familiarity with computer vision and/or natural language processing techniques (nice-to-have).
Knowledge of mathematical programming and optimization techniques (nice-to-have).
Proven experience in designing and delivering end-to-end data-driven solutions.




How to Apply:

If you are an accomplished Data Scientist with a strong track record of successful projects, open-source contributions, competition participation, or notable personal projects, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume along with any relevant publications, project portfolios, or supporting materials at hr@duferco.com.

As a Data Scientist, you will play a key role in analyzing complex datasets to identify trends, develop predictive models, and provide actionable insights. Working closely with cross-functional teams, you will help shape our data strategy, apply advanced machine learning techniques, and drive business outcomes through data.

Key Responsibilities


Data Analysis & Modeling: Extract, pre-process, and analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Build and validate statistical, machine learning, and predictive models to support business objectives.
Machine Learning & AI Development: Design and implement machine learning algorithms to solve complex business problems. Continuously improve models for scalability and performance.
Business Insights & Reporting: Translate data findings into actionable recommendations. Present insights to stakeholders using clear visualizations and data storytelling techniques.
Data Strategy & Governance: Contribute to data quality and governance efforts. Ensure adherence to data privacy and security standards.
Collaboration & Cross-Functional Support: Work closely with data engineers, analysts, and product teams to integrate data insights into products and services, and support ongoing improvement of data systems and processes.


Requirements


Education: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field; Master’s or Ph.D. preferred.
Technical Proficiency: Strong expertise in Python or R, SQL, and experience with machine learning libraries (e.g., Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Experience with Data Visualization Tools: Proficiency in tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar to convey insights effectively.
Machine Learning & Statistical Skills: In-depth knowledge of statistical modeling, machine learning algorithms, predictive analytics, and A/B testing.
Data Engineering Knowledge: Familiarity with data pipelines, ETL processes, and tools (e.g., Spark, Hadoop) is a plus.
Problem-Solving & Analytical Mindset: Ability to frame complex business challenges in analytical terms and find data-driven solutions.
Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to simplify complex technical information for non-technical audiences.


Preferred Qualifications


Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) for data processing and model deployment.
Knowledge of big data technologies and frameworks.
Familiarity with natural language processing, computer vision, or other advanced AI applications.
